html: (3 Nephi 22:12)."Windows of agates … gates of carbuncles … borders of pleasant stones." "Windows [pinnacles or turrets] of agates [rubies], gates of carbuncles [sparkling jewels], borders [walls] of pleasant [precious] stones." These could symbolize the beauty of the holy city, or dwelling place of the Saints of God, and the material blessings that will be poured out upon the righteous.
